name: Installation
description:
As a Spyglass Customer
In order to install a Spyglass-enabled MapR Cluster
I use one of the following installation methods

steps.name: the cluster does not have MapR Installed

result.error_message:
Check for nonexistence of /opt/mapr failed: Welcome to Ubuntu 14.04.3 LTS (GNU/Linux 3.13.0-77-generic x86_64)

 * Documentation:  https://help.ubuntu.com/
Last login: Thu Mar 10 22:38:33 2016 from 10.250.50.38
ls /opt/mapr
exit
root@perfnode148:~# ls /opt/mapr
[0m[01;34madminuiapp[0m           [01;34mexamples[0m     [01;34minstaller[0m           NOTICE.txt    [01;34mwebapps[0m
[01;34mbin[0m                  [01;34mhadoop[0m       [01;34mkafka[0m               [34;42mpid[0m           [01;34mzkdata[0m
[01;34mcheckservicescripts[0m  [01;34mhbase[0m        [01;34mlib[0m                 [01;34mroles[0m         [01;34mzookeeper[0m
[01;34mconf[0m                 hostid       [01;34mlibexp[0m              [01;34mserver[0m
[01;34mconf.new[0m             hostname     [30;42mlogs[0m                [01;34mservicesconf[0m
[01;34mcontrib[0m              [01;34minclude[0m      MapRBuildVersion    [01;34msupport[0m
[01;34mdrill[0m                [01;34minitscripts[0m  [01;34mmapr-cli-audit-log[0m  [01;34mthemes[0m

steps.name: I ssh into the node hosting "GUI Installer"
within my ssh session, I download "/mapr-setup.sh" to "/tmp" from the "GUI Installer" repo
within my ssh session, I execute "/tmp/mapr-setup.sh -y -u [installerRepoURL] [maprCoreRepoURL] [ecosystemRepoURL]"
it successfully starts the installer web server and outputs its URL to the screen
